sqlMap.select: SELECT GRADE , GRADE_NM , 'MIN_'||GRADE MIN_COL , 'MAX_'||GRADE MAX_COL FROM BSC_LEVEL_GRADE WHERE YEAR = #findYear# ORDER BY SORT_ORDER

SELECT A.YEAR , A.ITEM_GRP_ID , A.ITEM_GRP_NM
,
MAX(CASE WHEN B.GRADE = '$gradeArr[]$' THEN MAX_VALUE END) MAX_$gradeArr[]$
,
MAX(CASE WHEN B.GRADE = '$gradeArr[]$' THEN MIN_VALUE END) MIN_$gradeArr[]$
FROM BSC_LEVEL_ITEM_GRP A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_LEVEL_GRADE_CONVERT B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.ITEM_GRP_ID = B.ITEM_GRP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT YEAR, GRADE, GRADE_NM FROM BSC_LEVEL_GRADE WHERE YEAR = #findYear#) C ON B.YEAR = C.YEAR AND B.GRADE = C.GRADE WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.DELETE_DT IS NULL GROUP BY A.YEAR, A.ITEM_GRP_ID, A.ITEM_GRP_NM, A.SORT_ORDER ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER

SELECT A.YEAR , A.GRADE , A.GRADE_NM , B.MAX_VALUE , B.MIN_VALUE FROM BSC_LEVEL_GRADE A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_LEVEL_GRADE_CONVERT B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.GRADE = B.GRADE AND B.ITEM_GRP_ID = #itemGrpId# WHERE A.YEAR = #year# ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BSC_LEVEL_GRADE_CONVERT ( YEAR , GRADE , ITEM_GRP_ID , MAX_VALUE , MIN_VALUE , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #year# , #grade# , #itemGrpId# , #maxValue# , #minValue# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BSC_LEVEL_GRADE_CONVERT SET MAX_VALUE = #maxValue# , MIN_VALUE = #minValue# , MODIFY_DT = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND GRADE = #grade# AND ITEM_GRP_ID = #itemGrpId#
DELETE FROM BSC_LEVEL_GRADE_CONVERT WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND ITEM_GRP_ID = #itemGrpId#
